hero.title: TELENATURA
hero.subtitle: Sovereign Data Platform for the Agri-Food Chain
hero.description: TELENATURA connects producers, distributors and retailers in a secure data ecosystem, ensuring farm-to-table traceability.

solutions.title: Technological Solutions
solutions.description: Convergence between Hardware and Software for the digitalization of the primary sector

hardware.title: Field Hardware
hardware.description: Sensors, telecontrol stations and IoT devices for real-time monitoring

software.title: Management Software
software.description: Management, automation and GIS systems for data-driven decision making

drones.title: Drones and Photogrammetry
drones.description: Topography, cartography and crop analysis services using drones

energy.title: Energy Audits
energy.description: Analysis and optimization of energy consumption in agricultural operations

water.title: Water Management
water.description: Smart irrigation systems and water resource monitoring

valuations.title: Agricultural Valuations
valuations.description: Appraisals, assessments and valuations of farms and operations

dataSpace.title: Integration with Pontus-X
dataSpace.description: TeleNatura connects precision agriculture with the European sovereign data ecosystem

sovereignty.title: Sovereign Agricultural Data
sovereignty.description: Total control over data generated in agricultural operations, from sensors to crop analysis.

privacy.title: Privacy and Compliance
privacy.description: Data management compliant with GDPR and European agricultural sector regulations.

interoperability.title: Interoperability
interoperability.description: Integration with other European data spaces: AgriDataSpace, GreenDeal DataSpace.

cloud.title: Agricultural Cloud
cloud.description: Secure and scalable storage for telemetry data, drone imagery and time series.

organic.title: Organic Certification
organic.description: Automatic verification of cultivation practices for bio labels.

freshness.title: Guaranteed Freshness
freshness.description: Real-time IoT monitoring of cold chain.

dop.title: Designation of Origin
dop.description: Certified geographic traceability for premium products.

cta.title: Ready to digitalize your farm?
cta.description: Contact TeleNatura for a personalized consultation on automation, telemetry and precision agriculture.
